00024 File::Define::Define( const QString name, const QString value ):
00025 nameGroup_(name), value_(value) {
00026 }
00027 
00028 File::Define::Define( QDomNode& defineNode ):
00029 nameGroup_(defineNode), value_() {
00030 
00031         for (int i = 0; i < defineNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00032                 QDomNode tempNode = defineNode.childNodes().at(i);
00033 
00034                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:value")) {
00035                         value_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 
00039         // if mandatory elements are missing
00040         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty()) {
00041                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00042                         "spirit:define"));
00043         }
00044         else if (value_.isEmpty()) {
00045                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element value missing in "
00046                         "spirit:define"));
00047         }
00048 }

00058 File::Define& File::Define::operator=( const Define& other ) {
00059         if (this != &other) {
00060                 nameGroup_ = other.nameGroup_;
00061                 value_ = other.value_;
00062         }
00063         return *this;
00064 }

00066 // the constructor
00067 File::File(QDomNode &fileNode, FileSet* parent): name_(), fileId_(),
00068 attributes_(), nameAttributes_(), fileTypes_(), userFileTypes_(),
00069 includeFile_(false), externalDeclarations_(false), logicalName_(),
00070 logicalNameDefault_(false), exportedNames_(), dependencies_(), imageTypes_(),
00071 description_(), buildcommand_(), defines_(), parent_(parent) {
00072 
00073         // get the attributes for the file element
00074         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = fileNode.attributes();
00075         for (int j = 0; j < attributeMap.size(); ++j) {
00076                 QString name = attributeMap.item(j).nodeName();
00077                 QString value = attributeMap.item(j).nodeValue();
00078 
00079                 if (name == QString("spirit:fileId")) {
00080                         fileId_ = value;
00081                         fileId_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(fileId_);
00082                 }
00083                 else {
00084                         attributes_[name] = value;
00085                 }
00086         }
00087 
00088         // go through all the child nodes of the fileNode
00089         for (int i = 0; i < fileNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00090                 QDomNode tempNode = fileNode.childNodes().at(i);
00091 
00092                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00093                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00094                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, nameAttributes_);
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:fileType")) {
00098                         fileTypes_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:userFileType")) {
00102                         userFileTypes_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:isIncludeFile")) {
00106                         QString includeFile = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00107                         includeFile_ = General::str2Bool(includeFile, false);
00108 
00109                         // get the externalDeclarations attribute
00110                         QDomNamedNodeMap includeAttributes = tempNode.attributes();
00111                         QString externalDeclarations = includeAttributes.namedItem(
00112                                         QString("spirit:externalDeclarations")).nodeValue();
00113                         externalDeclarations_ = General::str2Bool(externalDeclarations,
00114                                         false);
00115                 }
00116 
00117                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:logicalName")) {
00118                         logicalName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00119                         logicalName_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(logicalName_);
00120 
00121                         // get the default-attribute
00122                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00123                         QString nameDefault = attributeMap.namedItem(
00124                                         QString("spirit:default")).nodeValue();
00125                         logicalNameDefault_ = General::str2Bool(nameDefault, false);
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:exportedName")) {
00129                         QString name = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00130                         name = General::removeWhiteSpace(name);
00131                         exportedNames_.append(name);
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:buildCommand")) {
00135                         buildcommand_ = QSharedPointer<BuildCommand>(
00136                                         new BuildCommand(tempNode));
00137                 }
00138 
00139                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:dependency")) {
00140                         dependencies_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00141                 }
00142 
00143                 // get the defines
00144                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:define")) {
00145 
00146                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00147                                 QDomNode defineNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00148 
00149                                 defines_.append(Define(defineNode));
00150                         }
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:imageType")) {
00154                         imageTypes_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00158                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00159                 }
00160         }
00161 
00162         // if mandatory elements are missing
00163 
00164         if (name_.isNull()) {
00165                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00166                                 "spirit:file"));
00167         }
00168 
00169         if (fileTypes_.size() == 0 && userFileTypes_.size() == 0) {
00170                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Neither spirit:fileType or "
00171                                 "spirit:userFileType elements found in spirit:file"));
00172         }
00173         return;
00174 }

00216 File & File::operator=( const File &other) {

00218         
00219                 name_ = other.name_;
00220                 fileId_ = other.fileId_;
00221                 attributes_ = other.attributes_;
00222                 nameAttributes_ = other.nameAttributes_;

00227                 logicalName_ = other.logicalName_;

00231                 imageTypes_ = other.imageTypes_;

00250 void File::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00251         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:file");
00252 
00253         // if fileId is defined
00254         if (!fileId_.isEmpty()) {
00255                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:fileId", fileId_);
00256         }
00257         General::writeAttributes(writer, attributes_);
00258 
00259         // if mandatory name is undefined
00260         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00261                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in spirit:file"));
00262         }
00263         else {
00264                 // start the spirit:name tag
00265                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:name");
00266 
00267                 // write the attributes for the element
00268                 General::writeAttributes(writer, nameAttributes_);
00269 
00270                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00271                 writer.writeCharacters(name_);
00272                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:name
00273         }
00274 
00275         // atleast one file type has to be specified
00276         if (( fileTypes_.size() == 0) && (userFileTypes_.size() == 0)) {
00277                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Atleast one file type has to be "
00278                                 "specified in spirit:file"));
00279         }
00280         else {
00281                 // write file types
00282                 for (int i = 0; i < fileTypes_.size(); ++i) {
00283                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:fileType", fileTypes_.at(i));
00284                 }
00285 
00286                 // write user file types
00287                 for (int i = 0; i < userFileTypes_.size(); ++i) {
00288                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:userFileType",
00289                                         userFileTypes_.at(i));
00290                 }
00291         }
00292 
00293         // start the spirit:includeFile tag
00294         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:isIncludeFile");
00295 
00296         // write the attributes for the element
00297         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:externalDeclarations",
00298                         General::bool2Str(externalDeclarations_));
00299 
00300         // write the value of the element and close the tag
00301         writer.writeCharacters(General::bool2Str(includeFile_));
00302         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:isIncludeFile
00303 
00304         // if optional spirit:logicalName element exists
00305         if (!logicalName_.isEmpty()) {
00306 
00307                 // start the spirit:logicalName tag
00308                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:logicalName");
00309 
00310                 // write the attributes for the element
00311                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:default",
00312                                 General::bool2Str(logicalNameDefault_));
00313 
00314                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00315                 writer.writeCharacters(logicalName_);
00316                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:logicalName
00317         }
00318 
00319         // write all spirit:exportedName elements
00320         for (int i = 0; i < exportedNames_.size(); ++i) {
00321                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:exportedName",
00322                                 exportedNames_.at(i));
00323         }
00324 
00325         // if buildCommand is defined, tell it to write itself
00326         if (buildcommand_) {
00327                 buildcommand_->write(writer);
00328         }
00329 
00330         // write dependencies
00331         for (int i = 0; i < dependencies_.size(); ++i) {
00332                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:dependency",
00333                                 dependencies_.at(i));
00334         }
00335 
00336         // write all defines
00337         for (QList<File::Define>::iterator i = defines_.begin();
00338                         i != defines_.end(); ++i) {
00339                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:define");
00340 
00341                 // write the name-value pair
00342                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", i->nameGroup_.name_);
00343                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", i->nameGroup_.displayName_);
00344                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", i->nameGroup_.description_);
00345                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:value", i->value_);
00346 
00347                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:define
00348         }
00349 
00350         // write all image types
00351         for (int i = 0; i < imageTypes_.size(); ++i) {
00352                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:imageType", imageTypes_.at(i));
00353         }
00354 
00355         // if description exists, write it
00356         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00357                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00358         }
00359 
00360         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:file
00361 }

00551 QString File::getCommand() const {
00552 
00553         // if build command is specified for this file specifically
00554         if (buildcommand_ && !buildcommand_->getCommand().isEmpty()) 
00555                 return buildcommand_->getCommand();
00556         
00557         // if build command is not specified then is must be asked from the parent
00558         // file set
00559         else {
00560                 return parent_->getDefaultCommand(this);
00561         }
00562 }
00563 
00564 QString File::getFlags() const {
00565 
00566         QString flags;
00567 
00568         // if build command is defined for this file specifically
00569         if (buildcommand_) {
00570                 
00571                 // if flags should replace the default ones
00572                 if (buildcommand_->getReplaceDefaultFlags())
00573                         return buildcommand_->getFlags();
00574 
00575                 // if flags should appended with default ones
00576                 else 
00577                         flags += buildcommand_->getFlags();
00578         }
00579 
00580         // append the flags from file set and return all flags
00581         flags += parent_->getDefaultFlags(this);
00582         return flags;
00583 }
00584 
00585 bool File::isRTLFile() const {
00586 
00587         // check all file types
00588         foreach (QString fileType, fileTypes_) {
00589 
00590                 if (fileType == QString("vhdlSource") || 
00591                         fileType == QString("vhdlSource-87") ||
00592                         fileType == QString("vhdlSource-93") ||
00593                         fileType == QString("verilogSource") ||
00594                         fileType == QString("verilogSource-95") ||
00595                         fileType == QString("verilogSource-2001"))
00596                         return true;
00597         }
00598         return false;
00599 }

00616 bool File::isQuartusPinmap() const {
00617 
00618         foreach (QString type, userFileTypes_) {
00619                 if (type == QString("quartusPinmap"))
00620                         return true;
00621         }
00622         return false;
00623 }

00633 bool File::isVhdlFile() const {
00634 
00635         foreach (QString fileType, fileTypes_) {
00636 
00637                 // if file type is for vhdl files
00638                 if (fileType.compare(QString("vhdlSource"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00639                         fileType.compare(QString("vhdlSource-87"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00640                         fileType.compare(QString("vhdlSource-93"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00641                                 return true;
00642                 }
00643         }
00644         return false;
00645 }
